structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - STREET USE AND CLEANLINESS

section.text: Citizens may plant trees in front of their lots and around their lots, on the sidewalks, under the supervision of the director of parks. No tree shall be planted in the streets or gutters. No person shall cut, destroy or injure any tree or box around same without permission from the director of parks. (Code 1959 , §19-19) Cross reference: Trees and vegetation, Part 9, Chapter 8.
